properties.displayName: Suspicious Diantz Alternate Data Stream Execution
properties.query:
DeviceProcessEvents
| where (ProcessCommandLine contains "diantz.exe" and ProcessCommandLine contains ".cab") and ProcessCommandLine matches regex ":[^\\\\]"

tags.name: description
tags.value: Compress target file into a cab file stored in the Alternate Data Stream (ADS) of the target file.
